Title: 1000 Babies
Content: Enter a cradle of mysteries where a man with a dark past manipulates multiple lives through a series of cryptic letters and deadly games.
Main_Cast: Sirajudheen Nazar, Rahman, Sanju Sivram, Adil Ibrahim, Neena Gupta

Title: Soul Stories
Content: The series explores the intertwined lives of women from diverse backgrounds, each facing unique challenges in their pursuit of freedom, self-respect, and self-esteem. Set against a backdrop of societal expectations, family dynamics, and personal battles, the narrative delves into their struggles and triumphs as they navigate careers, relationships, and self-discovery.
Main_Cast: Anarkali Marikar, Suhasini, Gopika Manjusha, Renji Panicker, Dayyana Hameed

Title: Nagendran's Honeymoons
Content: Story revolves around Nagendran and his wives who he marries due to different circumstances.
Main_Cast: Suraj Venjaramoodu, Kani Kusruti, Shweta Menon, Grace Antony, Alexander Prasanth

Title: Poacher
Content: A group of Indian Forest Service officers, NGO workers, police constables and Good Samaritans risk their lives trying to track down the biggest elephant ivory poachers in the history of India and bring them to justice.
Main_Cast: Nimisha Sajayan, Roshan Mathew, Dibyendu Bhattacharya, Ankith Madhav, Kani Kusruti

Title: Manorathangal
Content: An anthology of nine featurettes based on a curated selection of short stories by the celebrated writer M. T. Vasudevan Nair. Based in Kerala, these stories explore the nuances of human nature.
Main_Cast: Kamal Haasan, Surabhi Lakshmi, Mohanlal, Fahadh Faasil, Mammootty

Title: Kerala Crime Files
Content: A team of six policemen is on a chase to solve a murder in a suburban lodge room, with just one clue - a fake address, from the park register.
Main_Cast: Rooth P John, Devaki Rajendran, Aswathy Manoharan, Harishankar, Sreejith Mahadevan

Title: Love Under Construction
Content: Vinod is ready to build his dream house. But is he ready to face the hurdles in his path?
Main_Cast: Gouri G. Kishan, Aju Varghese, Anand Manmadhan, Neeraj Madhav, Ann Jameela Saleem

Title: Uppum Mulakum
Content: This amusing slice-of-life story follows Balachandran Thampi, his wife Neelima, and their five children through the everyday drama that unfolds in their lives.
Main_Cast: Nisha Sarangh, Juhi Rustagi, Biju Sopanam, Rishi Kumar, Al Sabith

Title: Perilloor Premier League
Content: Malavika, who comes to the village of Perilloor to find love with her boyfriend Sreekuttan, unexpectedly ends up becoming the village Panchayat President against her will.
Main_Cast: Nikhila Vimal, Sunny Wayne, Vijayaraghavan, Ashokan, Arun Pradeep

Title: Master Peace
Content: When marital discord becomes everyone's business and parents get way too involved in the "peace talks," family drama can become family trauma.
Main_Cast: Roshan Mathew, Nithya Menen, Divya Pillai, Jude Anthany Joseph, Maala Parvathi

Title: Chandanamazha
Content: Amrita, a naive but kind-hearted girl, navigates the complex dynamics between her mother-in-law and herself while staying loyal to her family and supporting her husband's dreams.
Main_Cast: Shalu Kurian, Murali Mohan, Dinesh Panicker, Roopashree, Meghna Vincent

Title: Marimayam
Content: A host of interesting characters encounter several frustrating and comical situations while visiting government institutions.
Main_Cast: Manikandan, Riyas Narmakala, Niyas Backer, Sneha Sreekumar, Vinod Kovoor

Title: Patharamattu
Content: A mother seeks ideal matches for her three daughters. Two families: wealthy jeweler Ananthamoorthy's clan and modest Udayabhanu and Kanakadurga with their daughters.
Main_Cast: Akash Murali, Neena Kurup, Lakshmi Keerthana, Anusha Aravindakshan, Bindu Ramakrishnan

Title: Kaliveedu
Content: Unavoidable circumstances force Nandhagopan's long-lost daughter Pooja into a contract marriage with lawyer Arjun. Though they're like chalk and cheese, fate has other plans for them.
Main_Cast: Rebecca Santhosh, Nithin Jake Joseph, Krishna Prabha, Uma Nair, Jeevan Gopal

Title: Thatteem Mutteem
Content: Arjunan's mother and wife have a love-hate relationship with each other, which often leads to humorous situations. However, Arjunan tries his best to bring about a truce between them.
Main_Cast: Jayakumar Parameshwaran Pillai, K.P.A.C. Lalitha, Prabhu Sidharth, Manju Pillai, Sagar Surya

Title: Jai Mahendran
Content: A cunning deputy tehsildar becomes a victim of a power play whose benefits he once enjoyed. To save his job and reclaim his reputation he must now manipulate an entire political and bureaucratic system to his advantage. '
Main_Cast: Saiju Kurup, Suhasini, Miya George, Vinita Venugopal, Abraham Joseph

Title: Chempaneer Poovu
Content: Revathy does odd jobs and works hard for the well-being of her family; her life changes when she crosses paths with Sachi, an erratic young man.
Main_Cast: Anjali Hari, Gomathi Priya, Maya Rajan, Rebecca Santhosh, Arun Nair

Title: Teacheramma
Content: Saraswathi teacher, everyone's favourite at school, but just a maid at home for her own kids. Between teaching and tending to her family, a devoted mother and teacher gives her all, while quietly yearning for the love she so richly deserves.
Main_Cast: Poornima Anand, Sreelakshmi, Aleena Sajan, Sayana Krishnan, Jayakumar Payyans

Title: Kudumbavilakku
Content: A woman does not get a moment of rest while doing all the household chores on top of being a dutiful wife, daughter-in-law and mother. Yet, she is never acknowledged or appreciated for her work.
Main_Cast: Meera Vasudevan, Krishnakumar Menon, Saranya Anand, Shaju Sham, Vaishnavi Sai Kumar

Title: Just Married Things
Content: The series revolves around a newlywed couple Adithyan who is a Radio Jockey at RadioExclusive 99.5 from Kochi and Balamani who is an unemployed graduate and a pakka village girl and their funny struggles to lead a wonderful married life.
Main_Cast: Keerthana Sreekumar, Sudhin Sasikumar, Jeeva Joseph, Sreevidya Mullachery

Title: Aliyans
Content: "Aliyan" is a Malayalam serial that tells a story with a single, continuous thread running through every episode. It focuses on the life of a character named Kanakan and explores various aspects of life, including happiness, struggles, issues, laughter, and tears
Main_Cast: Manju Pathrose, Sethu Lakshmi, Riyas Narmakala, Aneesh Ravi, Soumya Bhagyananthan

Title: Parasparam
Content: Deepthi strikes the perfect balance between her roles as a family woman and as the city police commissioner. Her relationships, both professional and personal, coupled with the consistent theme of familial bonds form the crux of the plot.
Main_Cast: Gayathri Arun, Vivek Gopan, Niranj Menon

Title: Kumkumapoovu
Content: Jayanthi and her illegitimate daughter Shalini were separated at Shalini's birth, with Jayanthi misled into believing her daughter had died while in fact the girl was raised for a time by a butcher, Markose, who treated her unkindly.
Main_Cast: Shelly Kishore, Asha Sharath, Sajan Surya, G.K. Pillai, Lishoy

Title: Kadamattathu Kathanar
Content: A family in Kerala is haunted by Yakshi, a demon. They seek the help of Kadamattathu, a priest who possesses supernatural powers, to bail them out of their problems.
Main_Cast: Sukanya, Prakash Paul, Sukumari, Prathapachandran, Reena

Title: Mounaragam
Content: Kalyani, who is speech impaired, is disliked by everyone in her family, except her mother. As she longs for her father's affection, Kiran enters her life.
Main_Cast: Naleef Gea, Aishwarya Ramsai, Sankar Lal, Balaji Sarma, Firosh

Title: Chakkappazham
Content: Follows the life of Uthaman and his family.
Main_Cast: Haritha Haridas, Asha Aravind, Muhammad Rafi, Praveen Menon, S.P. Sreekumar

Title: M80 Moosa
Content: Set in Calicut, M80 Moosa, a fisherman deals and faces several social and dramatic scenarios within him and his family.
Main_Cast: Surabhi Lakshmi, Vinod Kovoor, Anju Sasi, Athul Sreeva

Title: Koodathayi
Content: In a village called Koodathai, members of a family seem to die under mysterious circumstances. The police investigation leads to an astounding revelation.
Main_Cast: Muktha George

Title: Padatha Painkili
Content: Kanmani is a simple and generous girl from a middle-class family who falls in love with a rich boy and struggles to adjust to the new lifestyle.
Main_Cast: Monisha Magesh, Manu Martin Pallippadan, Sooraj Sun, Ambika Mohan, Maneesha Mahesh

Title: Cinemala
Content: Actors shed light on all the top stories, recent happenings and latest updates taking place all over the world in a humorous manner.
Main_Cast: Ramesh Pisharody, Manoj Guinness, Thezni Khan, Saju Kodiyan

Title: Vanambadi
Content: Anumol's passion for music knows no bounds and she finally meets her estranged father, the renowned singer Mohan Kumar.
Main_Cast: Chippy Renjith, Sai Kiran Ram, Gouri Krishna, Pria Menon, Jelina P

Title: Kasthooriman
Content: Sethulakshmi, a self-made artist, strives to raise her three daughters, Kavya, Keerthy and Kalyani.
Main_Cast: Sreeram Ramachandran, Rebecca Santhosh, Haritha G. Nair, Beena Antony, Anju Aravind

Title: Bhramanam
Content: Harilal, a divorced man who works as a branch manager of a renowned bank, comes across his children and ex-wife, who is a home nurse. The family drama depicts the series of devastating events experienced by Anitha and her relentless efforts at protecting her family.
Main_Cast: Mukundan, Lavanya Nair, Uma Nair, Ajoobsha, Sabu Varghese

Title: Ammayariyathe
Content: The story revolves around a woman,often called as teacher who intentionally commits crime and hide it by false accusations.The teacher is moving into a new plan of killing three people!Will she succeed??
Main_Cast: Keerthi Gopinath, Sreethu Krishnan, Neethu Krishna, Nikhil Nair, Boban Alumoodan, Parvati Nair

Title: Etho Janma Kalpanayil
Content: Sruthi, a middle-class, optimistic girl, and Ashwin, an arrogant and wealthy businessman. Their paths intertwine when Sruthi inadvertently interferes with one of Ashwin's business ventures, leading to a series of misunderstandings and confrontations. Despite their contrasting personalities and backgrounds, they develop a complex relationship, eventually falling in love.
Main_Cast: Manju Pathrose, Sindhu Varma, Dileep Shankar, Aiswarya Suresh, Sreelatha Namboothiri

Title: Chembarathi
Content: Due to unfortunate circumstances, Kalyani a village girl is forced to marry Anand, the eldest boy of a rich and strong-willed woman, Thrichambarath Akhilandeswari for whom Kalyani's father serves as a driver. She does not tell anyone about her marriage and works as a servant at the royal house.
Main_Cast: Aishwariyaa Bhaskaran, Amala Gireesh, Sebastian Jacob, Yavanika Gopalakrishnan, Jacob Stein

Title: Manjil Virinja Poovu
Content: A young girl, Anjana works in a tea plantation and ends up getting married to her employer's son. Due to her low stature, her mother-in-law makes life difficult for her, but she is determined to overcome it.
Main_Cast: Malavika Wales, Rekha Ratheesh, Yuva Krishna, Shalu Menon, Akhilesh

Title: Karyam Nissaram
Content: Karyam Nissaram" is a Malayalam comedy TV serial that tells the story of a village officer, Mohanakrishnan, and his lawyer wife, Sathyabhama. Each episode features a different social or familial issue, explored through their differing perspectives and opinions, with a strong emphasis on humor. The show highlights how differing viewpoints can be a source of humor rather than negativity in a marriage.
Main_Cast: Anu Joseph, Aneesh Ravi

Title: Ottachilambu
Content: A 6-year child is born "Devooty" who is born in same star sign and date of the mesmerising beauty called "Syamandakam"; who incubates into the body of the child. Syamandakam was burnt alive in the historically old 'Eloor' palace. Syamandakam takes a revenge note through Devooty to those who killed her and her family. In the process she falls in love with a young guy Adikeshavan; who helps her to take the revenge. The story puts light at the core to the aspirations and ambitions of those who die before fulfilling their lives.
Main_Cast: Nithya Das, Urmila Unni, Sharan Puthumana, Angel Mariya Joseph, Baby Manjadi Joby

Title: Thera Para
Content: Four jobless friends living in the suburbs or more correctly town struggling to cope up with daily problems. Added by their weird idiosyncrasies, can they find a way to manage themselves; before things get scary as like in the title.
Main_Cast: Anu K. Aniyan, Sabareesh Sajjin, Binoy John, Anand Mathews, Jeevan Mammen Stephen

Title: Samarthya Shastram
Content: The series is about five strangers — Joe, Jude, Venu, Arun and Daisy — from different walks of life, who lose their money after they are all duped by a person.
Main_Cast: Sabareesh Sajjin, Krishna Chandran, Nileen Sandra, Unni Mathews.

Title: Average Ambili
Content: "Average Ambili" is a web series that centers around a young woman named Ambili, who is perceived as average by her school and community. The series explores the challenges Ambili faces due to this perception, including bullying, being passed over for opportunities, and societal pressures to conform to traditional roles. Despite these challenges, Ambili strives to find her own path and express herself, challenging the notion of "average" and the unfair judgments associated with it.
Main_Cast: Aarsha Chandini Baiju, Zhinz Shan,Nandini Gopalakrishnan, Vishnu Agasthya, Adithyan Chandrashekar, Keerthana Sreekumar, and Manjula Mohandas.

Title: Scoot
Content: The Malayalam web series "Scoot" follows two young men, Sanju and Antony, and their friend Shyam, as they attempt to build a turf and face unexpected challenges, including financial difficulties and a potential love interest, Indu. The series features a cast including Arjun Ratan, Jeevan Mammen Stephen, Kiran Viyyath, and Divya M. Nair, among others. The show explores themes of friendship, ambition, and the struggles of starting a business.
Main_Cast: Arjun Ratan, Jeevan Mammen Stephen, Kiran Viyyath, Divya M. Nair

Title: Doosra
Content: It is a comedy series exploring the concept of arranged marriage through a lens that's both humorous and insightful.
Main_Cast: Jeevan Mammen Stephen , Arjun Ratan, Unni Mathews, Sabareesh Sajjin, Anu K. Aniyan, Kiran Viyyath

Title: Menaka
Content: A failed writer announces on TV his plan to commit 7 perfect murders in 7 days. After killing his first victim, a police team races to stop his meticulously planned crime spree.
Main_Cast: Ashwin kumar, Megha Thomas, Parvathi Satheesan, Samragni, Deepu G Panicker

Title: Thooval Sparsham
Content: A murder in the family forces two sisters to separate. Years later, one becomes a cop, the other an 'honourable thief'. What's in store for these opposites?
Main_Cast: Avantika Malik Khan, Sandra Babu, Mohan Avanthika, Ajoobsha
Production_Company: Lens and Shot Motion Pictures Pvt Ltd

Title: Geethagovindham
Content: A middle-aged businessman Govind, falls in love with Geethanjali, a young girl. Their unusual love story takes a hit when his past overshadows his present.
Main_Cast: Uma Nair, Sajan Surya, Jojo George, Binny

Title: Seetha Kalyanam
Content: Seetha is a maternal figure to her younger sister, Swathy, and endures all difficulties laid down by Rajeshwari to protect her sister from sorrow. Seetha and Rajeswary who is a millionaire became enemies at their first meeting itself and that day onward Rajeswary's aims to defeat and destroy Seetha.
Main_Cast: Dhanya Mary Varghese, Archana Suseelan, Sona Nair

Title: Erivum Puliyum
Content: When a family faces several ups and downs in their day-to-day lives, they make comical attempts to overcome their problems.
Main_Cast: Rishi Kumar, Shivani Menon, Nisha Sarangh, Biju Sopanam, Juhi Rustagi

Title: Seetha
Content: Seetha, a poor village girl, struggles to run her family with her earnings. However, problems start brewing in her life as her family members try to plot against her.
Main_Cast: Swasika Vijay, Shanavas Shanu and Bipin Jose

Title: Surabhiyum Suhasiniyum
Content: A daughter-in-law and her mother-in-law engage in constant fights with each other due to their differences which leads to various complications for the family.
Main_Cast: Mallika Sukumaran, Manju Pathrose, Krishnendhu Unnikrishnan, Aswathy Nair

Title: Akashadoothu
Content: Four siblings, who lost their parents at a young age, grow and take different paths. However, things take an unexpected turn when they reunite.
Main_Cast: Seema G.Nair, Shiju, Prem Prakash, Chippy Renjith

Title: Manjurukum Kaalam
Content: Unable to pay off his mounting debts, widower Govindhankutty is forced to give away his only daughter Janikutty. Childless couple, Vijayaraghavan and Rathnamma, adopt Janaki. Under their care and love, Janaki flourishes. However, Janaki’s life takes a turn for the worst when her adoptive parents eventually have a child of their own.
Main_Cast: Monisha Arshak, Alice Christy Gomez, Arathy Sojan, Ardra Das

Title: Ente Manasaputhri
Content: Sofia and Gloria are two orphans with different personalities who go through various difficulties as they try to have relationships and overcome obstacles.
Main_Cast: Sona Nair, Beena Antony, Archana Suseelan, Sreekala Sasidharan

Title: Sree Guruvayoorappan
Content: Sree Guruvayoorappan portrays the life and stories of Lord Krishna, specifically focusing on his manifestation as Guruvayoorappan, the presiding deity of the Guruvayur Temple in Kerala. The show likely explores themes of devotion, miracles, and the divine play of Krishna, drawing from Hindu mythology and folklore related to the Guruvayurappan deity
Main_Cast: ChippyRavi VallatholNedumudi Venu

Title: Karuthamuthu
Content: Despite having a heart of gold, Karthika continues to suffer a lot after getting married to Balu, as his mother, Jagatha, hates Karthika and tortures her ruthlessly.
Main_Cast: Rini Raj, Kiran Iyer, Darshana Das, Archana Suseelan, Kishore Satya

Title: Akkarakazhchakal
Content: Follows the life of few American Malayalis.
Main_Cast: Josekutty ValiyakallumkalSajini, SacharaiahJacob Gregory, Sajini Sacharaiah

Title: Santhwanam
Content: Sridevi and Balakrishnan sacrifice a lot to raise his brothers Hari,Shiva and Kannan.However, the family is soon forced to deal with various conflicts in life after the marriage of brothers.
Main_Cast: Rajeev Parameshwar, Chippy, Girish Nambiyar, Raksha Raj, Girija Preman

Title: Pandaraparambil House @801
Content: Pandaraparambil House at 801 is a series about a Malayalee family settled in Delhi. the father, P P Joseph, a bank manager in South Indian bank, is married to Mariamma Joseph, who is working as a nurse. They are blessed with two kids Justin, 14, and Sini, 12. This series depicts the life of a Malayalee family that holds on to their Malayalee roots while adapting to the Delhi environment.
Main_Cast: Thomas G. Kannampuzham, Shweta Kurian, Thomson George, Kevin Antony, Alina Jacob

Title: Kabani
Content: Kabani from an underprivileged background, faces barriers due to her family's past. She secures a scholarship through Kabaddi, moves to the city where she meets Rambha, her half-sister.
Main_Cast: Prem Jacob, Keerthana Anil, Gopika Anil

Title: Alliyambal
Content: Alli and Devan, whose views and aspects on life is completely poles apart each other, meets and falls in a tight bond of relationship.
Main_Cast: Jai Dhanush, Pallavi Gowda, Benny John

Title: Plus Two Class
Content: Depicts the experiences of students in their Plus Two (12th grade) class, particularly focusing on the character Ajmal Bismi. The series explores various aspects of school life, including class tests, study trips, and the overall dynamics within the classroom.
Main_Cast: Anand Mathews, Anu K. Aniyan, Binoy John, Jeevan Mammen Stephen, Sabareesh Sajjin, and Kiran Viyyath

Title: Insomnia Nights
Content: It centered around a group of friends navigating a night of unexpected events and reflections. The series explores themes of friendship, youth, and the relatable experiences of young adults
Main_Cast: Vishnu Agasthya, Austin Abraham, Mike RJ

Title: Better Half
Content: It focuses on the relationship between Anirudh and Pallavi, a married couple. The series explores their journey together, highlighting their initial astrological connection and their evolving understanding of each other's compatibility. Pallavi works, while Anirudh is a musician facing the challenges of his profession.
Main_Cast: Shyam Mohan, Nilja K. Baby, Nileen Sandra

Title: Kalakkachi
Content: A fish curry called Kalakkachi sparks rivalry when one hotel tries to ruin another's signature dish. The sabotaged curry creates chaos in four men's lives.
Main_Cast: Vincy Aloshious, Anu K., AniyanKrishna Chandran

Title: Sebastiante Velliyazhcha
Content: A young filmmaker has to source his own funds for his first feature film after his producer backs out at the last moment. He faces the risk of losing everything if his film fails to impress the audience and the critics.
Main_Cast: Anu K. Aniyan, Shinu Chacko, Adithyan Chandrashekar

Title: Circus
Content: It centers around the struggles and dynamics within a traditional circus troupe, highlighting themes of financial hardship, personal conflicts, and the clash between old and new ways of life. The series explores the lives of the circus performers, including a former star trapeze artist who had an accident, and the owner's son returning from abroad. It also touches on the owner's reluctance to sell the circus despite financial difficulties and the arrival of a new circus owner who wants to buy it.
Main_Cast: Anu K. Aniyan, Krishna Chandran, Sabareesh Sajjin

Title: Bharati Apartments
Content: Three film aspirants live in an apartment with hostile neighbors. They face comedy and drama while chasing their dreams.
Main_Cast: Krishna Chandra, Anu K. Aniyan, Sabareesh Sajjin

Title: Jabla
Content: This Series follows a young filmmaker named Jaren who is struggling to fund his first feature film after his producer backs out at the last moment. The series explores the challenges he faces in sourcing funds and the risk of failure if his film doesn't impress.
Main_Cast: Kiran Viyyath, Amrutha Krishnakumar, Vijaya MV, and Vaisakh Vijayan

Title: Thenks
Content: It follows the story of Lax and Shyam as they investigate a series of crimes, clues, and kidnappings
Main_Cast: Sruthy Suresh, Krishna Chandran, Sabareesh Sajjin

Title: Priyapettavan Piyush
Content: The protagonist, Piyush, is told by an astrologer that he must marry within five days to save his cancer-stricken mother. Piyush, who initially wants a love marriage, tries to convince his ex-girlfriends to marry him, leading to a series of comedic and awkward situations. The series explores themes of superstition, self-respect, and the pressure to marry, ultimately showing Piyush's journey to understanding what truly matters.
Main_Cast: Jeevan Mammen Stephen, Kiran Viyyath, Annu Antony

Title: Mokka
Content: It follows a group of friends and their everyday struggles and humorous situations. The series is known for its relatable and comedic take on the lives of young adults, often featuring everyday scenarios and interactions with a humorous twist
Main_Cast: Binoy John, Unni Mathews, Jeevan Mammen Stephen

Title: Porul
Content: Ravi arrives in the village of Kavassery and gets entangled in a decades-old child disappearance case his father once pursued. His quest for truth transforms into a journey of self-discovery, challenging his beliefs and identity.
Main_Cast: Maala ParvathiAnu, K. AniyanAnn, Jameela Saleem

Title: Something Fishy
Content: It blends comedy and suspense around a kidnapping mystery. The series is known for its quirky characters and engaging storyline, prompting viewers to form their own theories about the events.
Main_Cast: Krishna Chandran, Kiran Viyyath, Sabareesh Sajjin

Title: Rock Paper Scissors
Content: Story of three girls who stay together in an apartment. The story revolves around the little and witty moments in their life.
Main_Cast: Vidhya Vijaykumar, Deepa Thomas, Sruthy Suresh

Title: Utsaha Ithihasam - The Saga of the Spirited
Content: When Nitin Rajendran calls out to Kristo for help he turns up at his door. The help involves destroying someones property. When Kristo calls out for Nitin helps Nitin leaves everything and shows up. The help involves solving a girls problem.
Main_Cast: Zahoor Ahmed, Sarun Surendran, Venu Sasidharan Lekha

Title: Aadyam Jolie Pinne Kalyanam
Content: Satheeshan, a jobless youth falls in love with Revathy, a government employee. His attempts to gain a government job forms the rest of the story.
Main_Cast: Vimal Kumar, Jisma Jiji, Sharan S

Title: Singappooram
Content: This series is about an NRI (Non-Resident Indian) Malayali couple living in Singapore. The series follows the couple's relationship, which is portrayed as somewhat dull at times, but with moments of maturity. The series also explores the cultural differences and challenges faced by Malayalis living abroad.
Main_Cast: Ann Sooraj,Sooraj,Don

Title: Krishna Thulasi
Content: The story is all about two sisters, Krishna and Tulasi who are bonded with lovely sisterhood. Tulasi, a blind teenage girl who loves her sister and claims that her sister is her eye, meanwhile Krishna, the elder, cares about her 2 members family since the death of their parents and support her younger sister in all the social and psychological issues she faces as only because she is blind.These two sisters lives in the seashore and creates a lovely siblings-triangle drama.
Main_Cast: Anila Sreekumar, Mridula Vijay, Subhash Menon, Muhammed Rafi, Dini Daniel

Title: Swami Ayyappan
Content: Rajashekharan, a childless king, finds a baby in the middle of a jungle while on a hunting trip. When Shiva appears and says that the baby is of divine origin, Rajashekharan happily brings it home.
Main_Cast:
Kaushik Babu,
Devan,
Aishwariyaa Bhaskaran,
Sukanya,
Lakshmi Gopalaswamy,
Rajan P. Dev,
Nandhu,
K. R. Vijaya

Title: Sthreedhanam
Content: This serial explores the social issue of dowry and its impact on a woman's life. The story centers around Vidya, who faces mental and emotional torment from her husband's family due to their insatiable greed for dowry. The series highlights the struggles and resilience of a woman within a patriarchal society, showcasing her fight against the dowry system and its consequences.
Main_Cast: Chitra Shenoy, Divya Padhmini, Rajeev Roshan
